title: Owner's Share
description: Everything in the universe comes with a price.  When Diurnia Salvage and Transport undergoes a change in management, Captain Ishmael Horatio Wang finds himself adrift in a sea of red ink, and intrigue. He dives in only to find that he is over his head in a universe where cut-throat competition takes on an all new meaning. What tragic price will Captain Wang pay for his Ownerâ€™s Share?
author: Nathan Lowell
